short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will create a QR code for each page's link !!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to create a QR CODE of the link of the web page you are surfing. You just need to scan the QR CODE generated using your smart phones and the link is ready to be shared to anyone. :)
